Topic.Title: Do they really believe they can regulate a citizens constitutional right by executive order?

Message.Msg: **** No where in the Constitution does it directly say that citizens have a right to own gold/ The US Constitution guarantees us the right to life, liberty and property. Last time I checked, gold was property. **** The Constitution does however grant a right of gun ownership that shall not be infringed **** The right to bear arms shall not be infringed.. It says, "A well regulated militia being necessary to the security of a free state, the right of the people to keep and bear arms shall not be infringed."

Topic.Title: Do they really believe they can regulate a citizens constitutional right by executive order?

Message.Msg: More to the point, the question asked was does Barack Obama think he can regulate semi-automatic rifels by executive order. The correct answer is "Yes, he does." There may be a Constitutional challenge to his executive order. Do you think he cares? And who knows the ding-bats on the Supreme Court may back him up because Chief Justice John Roberts may find it politically expedient to not annoy the liberals.

Topic.Title: is retail worthless, are restaurants worthess,? not a necessary and important part of the economy?

Message.Msg: Delixscumbag, you posting this again. after getting trounced last time? Employers value employees based on weather they can get more back from their labor than they can from tier costs. If costs increase then maybe the employer can not afford as many employees, even if he likes them and values them as persons. It's a simple equation: Revenue - Costs = Net Profit or Loss The theory of marginal income/loss states that an employer will continue to hire new employees until: Revenue - Costs = 0 Net Income If the government enforces new regulations or new costs of employment (say ObamaCare) the employer will reduce employee count until Net Income = 0 again. This is really simple economics stuff.

Topic.Title: gop hate retail, restaurant and other workers

Message.Msg: Hey, stupid! How many times do we have to go over this? An employee's only value to an employer is the profit he can make on the employee's labor. According to marginal income theory an employer will hire new employees until marginal income = marginal costs and net profit is zero. If stupid communist government imposes new regulations or laws or employer give-a-ways then these will change the balance between marginal income and marginal costs. The employer will lay off employees until marginal income = marginal costs again. This is simple basic economics 101 stuff. Even a #$%$ like you should be able to understand it. Printing your stupidity over and over as if it was news merely shows what am imbecile you are.

Topic.Title: dickless345 - What a #$%$!

Message.Msg: Hey Dickless345! Haven't you figured out that Bush is not President anymore? Geee, figure it out dude! It's been in all the newspapers! You do recall that Bush was fighting a just war against enemies of our country? Some of his spending was increased because of that. You do recall that lots of Conservatives complained about Bush over spending too. We went over the Budget passed in 2008 for FY 2009 before: 1) The Congress was controlled by Democrats. And they agreed to it. If you read our Constitution you will find that BUDGETS properly start in the House of Representatives (which was controlled by the Democrats in 2008.) It was also passed by the Senate, which was also Democrat controlled. 2) Obama was President elect by the time this was passed and he was consulted and concurred on this budget. And Bush passed it with his consent. It included budget bills for the economic crisis that the treasonous Democrats started to get Obama elected. 3) Once Obama was in office he had a super majority in the House & senate and COULD have recalled and changed any items in this budget that he disagreed with. He did not. 4) In fact, Obama and his Democrat Congressional super majority ADDED significantly to the costs of Budget Yer FY 2009. 5) That by the way was also the LAST national budget the USA has had, even though the democrats controlled the Presidency & the Congress in 2009 & 2010. They STILL controlled the Presidency & the Senate in 2011 & 2012. And Harry Reid and the Democrat controlled Senate would not allow any budget to pass, not even Barack Obama's! So quite lying about Bush you despicable pile of excrement!
